TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed FromBase64TransformMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether white space should be ignored in the base 64 transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks White space includes the space character as well as tab characters, newline characters, and so on. Characters that constitute white space are those identified by the <xref:System.Char.IsWhiteSpace%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64TransformMode DoNotIgnoreWhiteSpaces = int32(1)

Docs.summary: White space should not be ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64TransformMode IgnoreWhiteSpaces = int32(0)
